products.title: Merino Wool Turtleneck
products.shortDesc: Fine gauge merino wool turtleneck for layering
products.longDescHtml:
A winter essential crafted from the finest merino wool. Lightweight yet warm, perfect for layering.

Features

  • 100% Extra Fine Merino Wool
  • Fine gauge knit
  • Classic turtleneck
  • Slim fit for layering
  • Ribbed cuffs and hem
  • Made in Italy

Versatility

Layer under blazers and coats, or wear alone with tailored trousers for refined simplicity.
products.seoTitle: Merino Wool Turtleneck - Winter Essential | MODETT
products.seoDescription: Fine gauge merino wool turtleneck. Lightweight warmth for effortless layering.
